Description:
Wondrous Setting For Charming Victorian On Spacious Block
This is an exciting opportunity for you to secure the space for your growing family. The charming Victorian is situated on a picturesque half acre block, with an extraordinary opportunity to lease the adjoining 3.5 acre crown allotment for only $65 per annum. The abode has three generous bedrooms, large living and an updated kitchen. There is a great feel to the home, but there's still scope for you to add a little flair. Outside you will find fantastic shedding with a 6x12 meter garage taking all your vehicles and still granting workshop space. Broken into three paddocks the property is ideal for family activities or a couple of livestock. This terrific lifestyle is had just 2 minutes from the Creswick hub of town and just over 20 minutes to Daylesford.
* This information has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly, all interested parties should make their own inquiries to verify the information.

Description:
Romantic Getaway circa 1880
This adorable 2 bedroom cottage has character and charm in abundance. Tastefully decorated, features combustion wood fire place & split system for year round comfort. Modern kitchen & bathroom are complimentary to the period. French doors from dining area open onto the brick paved, north facing bbq area. A second set of doors take you from the galley kitchen to the serenity of the rear veranda, perfect to read a good book or simply enjoy the delightful aspect of this lovely space. The beautiful garden, lovingly created by Vendor, has many features including a rose garden, vegetable garden, fruit & shade trees. Handy rear access to lane and wood shed with a difference!
All this and more, right in the heart of historic Talbot.
Purchase includes furniture less some personal effects and some sentimental pieces.
To arrange your inspection of 6 Ballarat St Nth, Talbot please contact:
Ange Flowers - 0437 456 908
Jo Millar - 0438 081 301

Description:
Sustainable Living In The Heart Of Creswick
This compact & very cosy three bedroom home with a stunning North facing permaculture garden & host of established fruit trees is a real treat for you to inspect.
Freshly painted inside & out and with double glazed windows, a freestanding combustion heater & a BREAZE solar hot water system to keep the bills down, this home will deliver the perfect beginning to first home buyers, garden lovers, downsizers or those looking for a sustainable start to their real estate portfolio.
A strategically placed split system, central wood heater, space heater & ceiling fans helps with the internal comfort through the seasons, while the light filled open plan through the living & meals areas are both welcoming & relaxed with leafy views to the garden. The kitchen works well for intermingling with guests or family, with plenty of preparation space, cupboards, gas & electric cooking & further views.
All bedrooms are suitably robed with the master providing sliding doors to the North facing deck which takes in the beauty of the natural bush outdoors, while the family bathroom & laundry both serve the entire home with ease.
Outside is where this home truly shines. A professionally designed, North facing permaculture garden with deep composting garden beds & a host of trees including Kiwi, Cherry, Apple, Pear & Avocado are bursting with edible fruit, while the paved alfresco area provides views towards the State Forest & St Georges Lake Reserve with your own private gate to enjoy all it has to offer.
A garden shed & wood shed, double carport, 14,000L of water tanks & a fox proof chook enclosure make this a truly unique home at a great price.
This fabulous property is situated just minutes from all the action & activity in the heart of Creswick, private gate access to Creswick walking & bike trails and only 20 minutes to Daylesford & 15 minutes to Ballarat.
Call our agent today for extra details, or even for a free apple off the tree!

Description:
Quality Home Of Grand Proportions, Close To Daylesford
Here we have a master built residence of grand proportions, set within the popular hamlet of Newlyn. Sitting on approx 1 acre (4,000m2) between Creswick & Daylesford, this sophisticated family home blends the latest in contemporary design with a wide flowing floor plan entrenched with a stylish décor, quality finishes & attention to detail in every room.
Designed & constructed approx 5 & a ½ years ago, this 30 square home incorporates multiple living zones, a high class kitchen plus a 7 square garage complete with toilet & roller door directly adjoining the undercover alfresco zone with a must have' open fireplace.
There are four good size bedrooms, including a master suite boasting a sun kissed ensuite & a massive fully fitted walk-in robe, while the remainder of the bedrooms are convened by chic family bathroom, separate toilet & laundry with walk in storage.
A formal lounge room provides room for evening celebrations with double doors opening to a rumpus room embracing children's play or games activities. Additions include: 9 foot ceilings, allergy free top of the range carpets, decorative cornices & grand formal entrance way.
The open plan kitchen, living & dining area create an exceptional communal space with quality features including; stainless steel appliances, a large walk-in pantry, built in wine storage, room for a double door fridge & mountains for preparation space & storage.
The home is heated by a wood heater as well as a strategically placed reverse cycle heating/cooling unit plus enough windows to take in the breath of the land from indoors.
Externally there is a 9 x 7.5m shed with power & concrete floor, along with town water, 22,500L of tank water with pump & enough fertile soil for further vegetable patches or additional gardens.
The school bus stop to Ballarat & Daylesford is close by to the home, with either a 10 minute commute to Daylesford or to the Western Highway at Wallace.
This superb home is perfectly positioned to embody a luxurious lifestyle. Call today for further details.

Description:
Great Value Home In A Fantastic Location
This is a slick property; presenting a double gated entrance to a massive shed with space for four cars plus a private driveway to a relaxed family friendly home with extra carport just minutes from the heart of Creswick.
Situated just off Melbourne Road & looking directly over the state forest & walking trails, this timber & brick home delivers a smart open floor plan with three good size bedrooms, a study nook, a modern family bathroom, laundry & two living areas.
Floating floors, carpet & tiled surfaces through the wet areas provides suitable comfort in each individual area, while this home is beautifully temperature controlled via a freestanding combustion heater along with a split system for instantaneous comfort level.
The kitchen is free flowing with storage options above & below the bench tops, with enough room to dine centrally, giving the family an interactive area to mingle with the chef.
This property with town water would be ideal for tradies or car enthusiasts with the huge shed fronting Battery Crescent, while gas is available from the street if the new owners wish to add further heating or cooking features.
This 800m2 property offers plenty of space with open lawns & low maintenance appeal, with the possibility of future subdivision (STCA) while also providing the ideal arrangement for a relaxed country lifestyle just 15 minutes from Ballarat.

Description:
Wondrous Cottage & Gardens That Pull On The Heart Strings
We could all picture ourselves enjoying this charming cottage. Either a picturesque home or an ideal B&B where occupants enjoy a glass of wine on the decking, taking in the delightful gardens and facing towards the sunsets. The charismatic home has two bedrooms, a renovated bathroom fitting the period and rustic styled lounge and kitchen. A separate bungalow is either a guest room, studio or home office. It too with its French doors and warmth brings a great feel to the property. Guests can enjoy all that Creswick has to offer and know that Daylesford is under half an hour away.

Address: Lot 5 Gillies Road Bald Hills VIC 3364
Description:
25 Acres Of Land, On The North Fringe
The freedom to dream, design and deliver a family home (STCA) dedicated precisely to your own priorities accompanies this desirable allotment in the beautiful setting of Sulky.
Surrounded by quality real estate in a prized North location just past Kennedys Road, this cleared allotment of 25 acres offers fertile soil, excellent grass cover and a good sized catchment dam for livestock.
Just 10 minutes' drive to the heart of Ballarat and a short drive to Dowling Forest Race Track & Western Highway, this location captures the opportunity to create a family home with scope for significant proportions, while also providing rural vistas on your very own exclusive farmlet.
Measuring approx. frontage 261m x 376m, this 10 hectare allotment features boundary fencing, an established driveway with power to a pit at the front and natural gas passing.
Quality bores are common in this area, therefore building and/or developing the site or pursuing your hobby farm dreams should not be an issue in this region.
For further details of this amazing deal, contact our agent today! Council property no 2053265.

Description:
The Hidden Acreage Getaway Your Family Has Been Seeking
This wondrous property grants the occupier fabulous views of hill tops, countryside and sunsets. The approximate 14 year old dwelling boasts the most generous of living areas and large bedrooms. Both the formal and casual zones have designated areas for both lounge and dining. The kitchen is fit for more than one cook in the family and again enjoys a lovely country outlook. All year comfort is had with wood fire and large reverse cycle system. There are 3.9 acres to enjoy, whether it's for horses, backyard cricket or maybe build a tennis court. Those that look for shedding will appreciate the double garage which adjoins the home and the secondary 8x9m shedding to fit all the toys or workshop. This charming lifestyle is only 5 minutes to Creswick and 20 minutes to either Ballarat or Daylesford.

Description:
Scenic Views - 2 BR Cottage on a large 1700m²
This lovely residence is nestled amongst established trees set well back from the front entrance, offering a scenic outlook from an elevated setting. Comprising front veranda spacious living room, dining room, kitchen, two bedrooms and bathroom. The property fronts two streets and has a private setting, garage and shedding. Offering the purchaser various options with such a large allotment and any potential development would be Subject to Council Approval.

Description:
Quiet, low maintenance country town living all on 2400m2
Positioned perfectly in a highly sought after part of Creswick, located only 10 minutes to Ballarat, 20 minutes to Daylesford and a short distance from the Creswick primary schools, local shops, bus connection & amenities. This three bedroom home will suit families or retirees and has all the modern comforts expected of a near new dwelling including wall to wall tiles providing you with low maintenance and easy care living. These extra features are sure to delight; open plan design, ensuite and walk in robe to master, 8 solar panels keeping the costs down on the electric appliances, 2 x split systems, SS appliances plus electric under bench oven and hot plates. Double garage with secure access inside plus an additional double garage with roller door access to the rear part of the property. With over half acre of land, this will give you enough room for all the extras or to extend your outside living space. Be quick to inspect!

Description:
Rural property with 360 degree views
A rare opportunity exists to acquire a unique location in historic Smeaton. Elevated 360 degree views from the property take in the iconic Andersons Mill, idyllic Birch Creek, an old bluestone bridge, an oak grove, rolling hills and even a recreation oval. Situated on 2578 sqm approx, the magical gardens add to the stunning vistas and provide numerous secluded spaces for outdoor entertaining and recreation.
The home offers versatile living spaces which are currently being used as two bedrooms, a sunroom, separate parents retreat, loungeroom, living area and library nook. The property also features a man cave and water tanks to complement the town water supply.
Situated less than 20 minutes to Daylesford and also central to popular tourist towns Creswick and Clunes. Whether it’s watching the moon rise over Birch Creek or the sun setting over Mt Beckworth this property offers natural beauty that must be seen to be believed.
Inspections strictly by appointment only

Description:
YOUR LIFESTYLE OPPORTUNITY PROPERTY AWAITS
Be in the heart of the Goldfields region, minutes from popular Talbot and also on the Ballarat side is this little hidden gem. Offering 5 bedrooms, 2 living areas and on around 9 Acres of Farm zoned land. Brick construction, light filled home with spacious kitchen, plenty of storage, electric cooking and dining area adjacent has as new reverse cycle split system and wood fire and has slate flooring throughout walk areas.
The family bathroom and ensuite have had recent updates, master also has walk through robe and the other 4 bedrooms with built in storage.
Two living areas at opposite ends ideal for multiple entertaining or for the kids to have a zone. Outside is full verandah at front of home and patio area to sit and relax. The spacious 9 Acres is beautiful, 3 dams for wildlife or pump to garden. Adjacent to state forest, tank and mains water, power and even mobile phone service. Multiple garden beds for growing your own vegetables, misc storage sheds, large double garage with concrete floor and space for more shedding STCA.
Fully fenced property, farming zone and your opportunity to buy is now.

Description:
The Size Home, Allotment, Shedding & Surrounds You Desire
This home is sure to cause a stir. The large family dwelling has great room proportions with the fourth bedroom being an optional formal dining or studio. There is a vast open plan kitchen, meals and lounge. The home is set back from the street for privacy and yet still offers a huge amount of yard space for games, pets and gardens, while hosting great shedding. The 1859m2 block has two oversized garages with workshop space and a tandem carport adjoining the residence. The abode overlooks bushland, while being just a three minute drive back into the hub of town for shopping or your favorite coffee. Entertainers will also appreciate the large outdoor area for your guests.
